# SHError.Code.signatureDurationInvalid

**Case**

The error code to indicate that the length of the generated signature is too long or too short to make a match in the catalog.

## Declaration

```swift
case signatureDurationInvalid
```

## Discussion

This error occurs when the length of the generated signature is less than [doc://com.apple.shazamkit/documentation/ShazamKit/SHCatalog/minimumQuerySignatureDuration] or greater than [doc://com.apple.shazamkit/documentation/ShazamKit/SHCatalog/maximumQuerySignatureDuration] for the session [doc://com.apple.shazamkit/documentation/ShazamKit/SHSession/catalog].

## Signature errors

- **SHError.Code.signatureInvalid**: The error code to indicate that the system is unable to generate a signature from the audio.

items.description: The error code to indicate that the system is unable to generate a signature from the audio.
